title: Clipboard API and events
description: This document describes apis for clipboard operations such as copy/cut and paste, or drag and drop in web applications.

versions.title: Clipboard Operations for the Web 1.0: Copy, Paste, Drag and Drop.

title: Custom Elements
description: This document describes the method for enabling the author to define and use new types of DOM elements in a document.

title: Gamepad
description: Defines a low-level interface that represents gamepad devices.

title: HTML 5.3
description: This specification defines the 5th major version, third minor revision of the core language of the World Wide Web: the Hypertext Markup Language (HTML). In this version, new features continue to be introduced to help Web application authors, new elements continue to be introduced based on research into prevailing authoring practices, and special attention continues to be given to defining clear conformance criteria for user agents in an effort to improve interoperability.

title: Intersection Observer
description: This specification describes an API that can be used to understand the visibility and position of DOM elements ("targets") relative to a containing element or to the top-level viewport ("root"). The position is delivered asynchronously and is useful for understanding the visibility of elements and implementing pre-loading and deferred loading of DOM content.

title: Pointer Lock 2.0
description: This specification defines an API that provides scripted access to raw mouse movement data while locking the target of mouse events to a single element and removing the cursor from view. This is an essential input mode for certain classes of applications, especially first person perspective 3D applications and 3D modeling software.

title: The Screen Orientation API
description: Defines APIs to read screen orientation state and to lock the screen orientation to a specific state.

title: Selection API
description: This specification defines APIs to select objects within a document.

title: UI Events KeyboardEvent code Values
description: This specification defines the values for the KeyboardEvent.code attribute which is defined in DOM 3 Events.

title: UI Events KeyboardEvent key Values
description: This specification defines the values for the KeyboardEvent.key attribute which is defined in DOM 3 Events.

title: Using ARIA
description: This document is a practical guide for developers on how to add accessibility information to HTML elements using ARIA, a markup mechanism for making Web content and Web applications more accessible to people with disabilities.

versions.title: Notes on Using ARIA in HTML
Notes on Using ARIA in HTML
Notes on Using ARIA in HTML
